svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/136.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="27.0.9" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="microservice vs monolithic" id="GJ--tk3FVJ2aPJq_jcqE"> <mxGraphModel dx="1423" dy="838" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="0dTNGH8x9K49SjUzDVmt-1" value="<font style="font-size: 35px;">Monolithic VS Microservices Architecture</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="90" width="680" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0dTNGH8x9K49SjUzDVmt-9" value="<font style="font-size: 30px;">Monolithic Architecture</font>" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0dTNGH8x9K49SjUzDVmt-7" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#66B2FF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="287" width="250" width="39.38992042440318" height="41.44736842105264" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0dTNGH8x9K49SjUzDVmt-47" value="<font color="#ffffff" style="font-size: 16px;"><b>API GATEWAY</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#B266FF;" parent="0dTNGH8x9K49SjUzDVmt-50" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="8.355437665782492" y="402.63157894736844" width="441.6445623342175" height="47.36842105263158" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0dTNGH8x9K49SjUzDVmt-52" value="<ul style="font-size: 16px;"><li>tightly coupled components</li><li>single codebase</li><li>single deployment unit</li></ul>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="770" width="240" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0dTNGH8x9K49SjUzDVmt-53" value="<ul style="font-size: 16px;"><li>loosely coupled services</li><li>Independent codebases</li><li>separate deployment units</li><li>communication via APIs</li></ul>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="670" y="770" width="290" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
